group.sql: SELECT t1.id,t2.username,t1.v_id,t1.updatetime,t1.voicename,t1.content,t3.username as checkuser,t1.filename,t1.`status`,t1.reason FROM (SELECT id,userid,v_id,updatetime,voicename,filename,content,checkuser,`status`,reason FROM user_voice_audit WHERE v_id=?) t1 INNER JOIN `user` t2 ON t1.userid=t2.id INNER JOIN admin t3 ON t1.checkuser=t3.id
